titleStmt.title: A hue and cry after the worst of murderers, in the case of the Duke of Buckingham.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Mary, fl. 1679-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T.F. and are to be sold by W. Davis in Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Includes two depositions on the attempted murder, from Mary Wright.
Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
